alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; North Snowy Range Foothills; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 16 at 12:35PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...STRONG WINDS IN WIND PRONE AREAS OF SOUTHEAST WYOMING THROUGH 5PM THIS AFTERNOON... Current observations show gusty winds around 45 to 55 MPH for the wind prone areas of Interstate 80 near Arlington...the Interstate 80 Summit between Cheyenne and Laramie...as well as Interstate 25 near Bordeaux. Strong winds will continue this afternoon before easing after 5 PM. During this time, southwest winds could gust up to 55 MPH. Travel could be difficult, especially for light weight and high profile vehicles on I-80 and I-25.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; North Snowy Range Foothills; South Laramie Range Foothills
